plot: Born with water on the brain, abandoned at birth and given just months to live, Oggi Tomic did not get the best start in life.
title: Finding Family
plot_es: Born with water on the brain, abandoned at birth and given just months to live, Oggi Tomic did not get the best start in life.
plot_en: Born with water on the brain, abandoned at birth and given just months to live, Oggi Tomic did not get the best start in life.
